Package net.chaossquad.mclib.entity

Klasse ManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity>

java.lang.Object
net.chaossquad.mclib.entity.ManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE>
Typparameter:
ENTITY_TYPE - entity type
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
ManagedListener, Removable, SchedulerInterface, org.bukkit.event.Listener
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
RespawningManagedEntity, SingleUseManagedEntity
public abstract class ManagedEntity<ENTITY_TYPE extends org.bukkit.entity.Entity> extends Object implements ManagedListener, Removable, SchedulerInterface
This class provides a manager for entities.
It allows to schedule tasks for entities and works as managed listener.
The goal of this class is to allow scheduling tasks and listen to events while the entity is alive, and then auto-cleanup tasks and listeners when the entity is dead.
DO NOT REGISTER THIS ENTITY DIRECTLY TO THE BUKKIT EVENT LISTENER!!!
Only register it to a CoreExecutable or a similar solution!
If you register it directly to Bukkit, it causes a memory leak because the listener is never cleaned up!

    • scheduleRepeatingTask

      public final long scheduleRepeatingTask(@NotNull @NotNull TaskRunnable runnable, long delay, long interval, Removable removeCondition, @Nullable @Nullable String label)
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: SchedulerInterface
      Creates a new repeating task.
      Angegeben von:
      scheduleRepeatingTask in Schnittstelle SchedulerInterface
      Parameter:
      runnable - runnable of the task
      delay - how long should be waited to run the task the first time
      interval - how long should be waited to run the task again after the last execution
      removeCondition - a stop condition that will be checked every tick
      label - task label
      Gibt zurück:
      task id (positive if successfully added)
